PHRASE.LANG: In Freezeball, a player must place their balls strategically to freeze the opponents balls. After a shot, any players balls that are not currently frozen will freeze opponents balls if they are within line of sight. Players frozen balls may be unfrozen if they are no longer within line of sight with the opponents balls after the shot. The object of the game is to win by freezing all of the opponents balls.

Le but de Freezeball est d'immobiliser toutes les billes adverses en les intégrant dans votre ligne de visée directe. Pour gagner, au moins l'une de vos billes doit rester mobile, tandis que vous paralysez stratégiquement vos adversaires !

Ziel in Freezeball ist es, alle Kugeln Ihres Gegners außer Gefecht zu setzen, indem Sie sie in Sichtweite Ihrer eigenen bringen. Sie haben gewonnen, wenn mindestens eine Ihrer Kugeln aktiv ist, während Sie alle gegnerischen Kugeln außer Gefecht gesetzt haben!

Lo scopo del gioco è immobilizzare tutte le palle dell'avversario spingendole sulla traiettoria delle tue in modo che siano sulla stessa linea retta, senza ostacoli frapposti. Per vincere devi fare in modo che almeno una delle tue palle sia libera, mentre paralizzi tutte quelle avversarie.

El objetivo de Freezeball es inmovilizar todas las bolas de tu rival, poniéndolas en el punto de mira directo de las tuyas. Lograrás la victoria si consigues que al menos una de tus bolas no quede inmovilizada y paralizas todas las de tu rival estratégicamente.

In Freezeball, a player must place their balls strategically to freeze the opponents balls. After a shot, any players balls that are not currently frozen will freeze opponents balls if they are within line of sight. Players frozen balls may be unfrozen if they are no longer within line of sight with the opponents balls after the shot. The object of the game is to win by freezing all of the opponents balls.
